tool_description: An API for all Saudi Exchange Stocks Tadawul information
name: Saudi Exchange Stocks Tadawul
title: Saudi Exchange Stocks Tadawul

api_list.name: Get Daily Information for all companies
api_list.description: Get Tadawul Daily information for all companies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://saudi-exchange-stocks-tadawul.p.rapidapi.com/v1/getDailyInformation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "saudi-exchange-stocks-tadawul.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://saudi-exchange-stocks-tadawul.p.rapidapi.com/v1/getDailyInformation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "saudi-exchange-stocks-tadawul.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Dividend
api_list.description: You can use this API to get the whole dividend recorded in tadawul

api_list.name: Get Stock Prices
api_list.description: You can use this api to get stock prices using time period.

required_parameters.name: period
required_parameters.description:
You can use the following :
1D, 5D, 3M, 6M, 1Y, 5Y, AY
